Description.SourceString: Evolving a Hero greatly increases their power by improving attributes and the stats of Special, Passive, and Commander Skills. It's safe to evolve a Hero any time you meet the requirements - skill experience and stat gains will transfer over to the evolved Hero.  Most Heroes can be evolved at least once.
Description.LocalizedString: Evolving a Hero greatly increases their power by improving attributes and the stats of Special, Passive, and Commander Skills. It's safe to evolve a Hero any time you meet the requirements - skill experience and stat gains will transfer over to the evolved Hero.  Most Heroes can be evolved at least once.
